p: Non-terpene hydrocarbons are undesirable for their poor contribution to the aroma or flavor of essential oils [ 29]. Essential oils of P. suffruticosa Andr. also contained certain amounts of terpene hydrocarbons (0.1â€“6.6%), which were not detected in the hydrolate extracts. It is known that oxidation or polymerization of terpene hydrocarbons which occur under oxygen or light is the main reason for deterioration of essential oil quality [ 30].
